name: quichem
short_description:
quichem is a utility written in pure Python allowing for fast input and parsing of chemical formulae and equations. Entering data does not require any modifier keys or keystrokes to be pressed.

This SourceForge page provides pre-built Windows binaries of quichem-pyside. **To run quichem on Mac OS X or Linux**, or with the wxPython front-end, please download the source from quichem's GitHub page at: github.com/spamalot/quichem.
summary: Utilities for fast input of chemical formulae and equations.
